name: Music_683.wav
caption: This is a British hip-hop music piece. There is a male vocal rapping in the lead. The beat in the background has its main melody being played by the acoustic guitar. A faint bass sound can be heard in the background. The rhythm is provided by an electronic drum beat. The atmosphere is hip and the sound is urban. This piece could be used in the soundtrack of a teenage drama movie that takes place in Great Britain.
